If the exact item is not available any more, you can allow the material to be different, but you want the color to be the same as your other 1L bottle.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi. I'm feeling a bit upset because I made a mistake with my purchase. I just bought a 500ml water bottle, but I've realized it's much too small for what I need. I actually just placed another order for a 1000ml bottle, and I'd like to change the small one to match the 1000ml one instead. Is that possible?

message.content: Hi. I'm feeling a bit upset because I made a mistake with my purchase. I just bought a 500ml water bottle, but I've realized it's much too small for what I need. I actually just placed another order for a 1000ml bottle, and I'd like to change the small one to match the 1000ml one instead. Is that possible?

messages.content: I'm sorry to hear that! I can certainly look into that for you. To get started, could you please provide your email address so I can locate your account? Alternatively, your first and last name along with your zip code would also work.

message.content: I'm sorry to hear that! I can certainly look into that for you. To get started, could you please provide your email address so I can locate your account? Alternatively, your first and last name along with your zip code would also work.
